vera_returns_changed.speaker: Narrator
vera_returns_changed.text: The door opens, and Captain Vera steps in. But she's transformed. There's color in her cheeks, and the weight that bowed her shoulders seems lifted.

vera_greeting.speaker: Captain Vera
vera_greeting.text: *She spreads her arms wide* Look at this old sea dog! I did it. I went back. I faced the tides, the memories, all of it.

vera_wedding.speaker: Captain Vera
vera_wedding.text: The wedding was beautiful. Jonas's daughter... *Her voice catches but she smiles* She has his eyes. She told me stories about him I never knew. He used to talk about me, about our adventures.

vera_peace.speaker: Captain Vera
vera_peace.text: She said he would have made the same choice. That he knew, in that moment, what I would decide. And he was proud to sail under my command.

vera_tears.speaker: Captain Vera
vera_tears.text: *Tears stream down her face, but she's smiling* I stood on the shore at sunset. First time in five years I let the saltwater touch my boots. And do you know what I felt?

vera_answer.speaker: Captain Vera
vera_answer.text: Home. After all this time. The sea... it's part of me. I can't change what happened, but I can honor Jonas by living. Really living.

vera_gift.speaker: Captain Vera
vera_gift.text: *She hands you another recipe* Crab cakes. Jonas's daughter shared it with me. A family recipe, now yours. And listen... I've decided to stay. Not running this time. Choosing.

vera_final.speaker: Captain Vera
vera_final.text: Dragon Haven isn't just a cafe. It's a harbor. A place where storm-battered souls can find safe passage. Thank you for being my lighthouse when I was lost.
